author: Pat Flynn
title: Threatening posters in Co Clare tell holiday home owners to ‘f**k off’
description: Gardaí investigating creators of ‘Kilkee Residents’ Health Defence’ posters
content:
Gardaí are investigating the source of threatening posters that were apparently displayed at different locations in a popular West Clare resort town.
The A4 printed pages were posted at various locations in Kilkee including outside mobile home parks and holi… [+2596 chars]
